title: In the Classical Way
dc:creator: Jon Smajda
description: David Phillippi from Mind of Modernity joins the conversation this week. We kick things off with a discussion of liberal professors and political bias in sociology. Arturo unleashes his inner radical, pleading with us to “be the counter-narrative”, while Jon and Chris bring him down with a depressing case for the End of Sociology. Download […]
content:encoded:
David Phillippi from Mind of Modernity joins the conversation this week. We kick things off with a discussion of liberal professors and political bias in sociology. Arturo unleashes his inner radical, pleading with us to “be the counter-narrative”, while Jon and Chris bring him down with a depressing case for the End of Sociology.

Download Improv #15

Arturo unleashes his inner radical, pleading with us to "be the counter-narrative", while Jon and Chris bring him down with a depressing case for the End of Sociology.
